usecase.name: Account Creation
usecase.scenario: User creates an account on several social media marketing platform.
usecase.preconditions: User is not already registered on the platform
steps: User provides necessary information for account creation
User sets up account details (username, password, etc.)

testcases.name: Valid Account Creation
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully create an account.

testcases.name: Invalid Email Verification
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user provides an invalid email for verification.

usecase.name: Content Creation and Posting
usecase.scenario: User creates content and posts it on selected social media platforms.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in and has connected social media accounts
steps: User creates content (text, image, video, etc.)
User selects social media platforms for posting

testcases.name: Valid Content Posting
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully create and post content on selected social media platforms.

testcases.name: Invalid Content Posting
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user tries to post invalid content or selects unsupported platforms.

usecase.name: Content Analytics
usecase.scenario: User views analytics for their posted content on social media platforms.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in and has posted content on selected social media platforms
steps: User navigates to the analytics section
User selects a specific content or time range
User views analytics data for engagement, reach, and interactions

testcases.name: Valid Content Analytics
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully view analytics for their posted content.

testcases.name: Invalid Content Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user selects invalid or non-existent content for analytics.

usecase.name: Profile Analytics
usecase.scenario: User views analytics for their social media profiles connected to the platform.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in and has connected social media accounts
steps: User navigates to the profile analytics section
User selects a specific social media profile
User views analytics data for followers, engagement, and growth

testcases.name: Valid Profile Analytics
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully view analytics for their connected social media profile.

testcases.name: Invalid Profile Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user selects an invalid or non-existent social media profile for analytics.

usecase.name: Community Communication
usecase.scenario: Users within the community (sellers and buyers of similar products) communicate and share information.
usecase.preconditions: Users are logged in and have joined the relevant community
steps: User navigates to the community section
User selects a specific community related to their product niche
User posts a message, question, or information within the community
Other users within the community can view and respond to the post

testcases.name: Valid Community Communication
testcases.description: Verify that users can successfully communicate within the community.

input.postContent: Has anyone tried the new XYZ product? Share your experiences!
responses: Yes, I've tried it. It works great!
No, but I'm interested in learning more.
I have a similar product, let's collaborate.

testcases.name: Invalid Community Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user tries to communicate in an invalid or non-existent community.

input.postContent: This is an invalid community post.

testcases.name: Empty Post
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user tries to post an empty message within the community.

usecase.name: Hashtag and Keyword Suggestions
usecase.scenario: User receives suggestions for relevant hashtags and keywords to enhance the visibility and reach of their posts.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in and has created content for posting
steps: User navigates to the hashtag and keyword suggestion section
User enters or selects the content for which they need suggestions
System provides relevant hashtag and keyword suggestions

testcases.name: Valid Hashtag and Keyword Suggestions
testcases.description: Verify that a user receives relevant hashtag and keyword suggestions for their content.

expected.outcome: Hashtag and keyword suggestions retrieved successfully

testcases.name: Empty Content for Suggestions
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user tries to get suggestions without entering any content.

expected.outcome: Hashtag and keyword suggestions retrieval failed

testcases.name: Content with Existing Hashtags
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user's content already contains hashtags, and the system suggests additional relevant hashtags.

testcases.name: Content with Special Characters
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user's content contains special characters and suggests hashtags and keywords accordingly.

expected.outcome: Hashtag and keyword suggestions retrieved successfully
